meanings.definition: Producing several broods in a year.
meanings.sent1: The multivoltine butterflies fluttered around the garden all summer long.
meanings.sent2: The multivoltine birds nested multiple times in the same tree during the year.
meanings.sent3: The multivoltine rabbits seemed to have a never-ending family reunion in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: Her multivoltine work ethic was like a tireless machine, constantly churning out results.
meanings.sent5: The multivoltine flowers bloomed repeatedly, painting the field with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to an organism that has multiple generations in a single year.
meanings.sent1: The multivoltine insects quickly populated the garden with their offspring.
meanings.sent2: The multivoltine fish species had a complex life cycle within a single year.
meanings.sent3: The multivoltine trees seemed to have a family reunion every season.
meanings.sent4: Her multivoltine storytelling passed down tales through generations like a living history book.
meanings.sent5: The multivoltine bacteria multiplied rapidly, spreading throughout the environment.
